cleaned_text: Affect Their Health?](https://chwbonline.com/womens-hormones-affect-health/) Our bodies have 50 hormones working hard to keep us healthy. These hormones are pretty good at knowing what to do. But sometimes, due to external or internal factors, they become imbalanced.
